column4: Off Topic: A friend asked me to fix his Dell, it has a busted mobo. The case Has only 4 rear slots pro pci cards. The mobo that is in it has only 3 pci slots and integrated video. The case is full size. My question is: will a mini OR a regular ATX both fit in it? I know micro atx is too small. I want to make sure I get the right size for it.
wy_; put a # in front ofi t
philo23; yes. you have to mount it
